title: War and Peace
description: War and Peace is a novel by the Russian author Leo Tolstoy. It is regarded as a central work of world literature and one of Tolstoy's finest literary achievements.

title: The Lord of the Rings
description: The Lord of the Rings is an epic high fantasy novel written by English author and scholar J. R. R. Tolkien. The story began as a sequel to Tolkien's 1937 fantasy novel The Hobbit, but eventually developed into a much larger work.

title: Northern Lights
description: Northern Lights is a young-adult fantasy novel by Philip Pullman, published by Scholastic UK in 1995.
